description: Upon closer examination Annabelle is a beautiful woman. She is dressed for a party, wearing a bright yellow gown, white elbow length gloves and a pair of white slippers. Her hands have never known a day of labor. She carries on her face a practiced neutral expression. If it weren't for her hidden glances towards Elizabeth it would seem she is completely unaware of tonights events.
Jeremiah, who else? The man has been living here alone for decades, he's obviously crazy. He wasn't happy about the sale of the house.
He's a long time friend of Jameson, but I hardly know him. He's been galavanting around the world for as long as I've known Jameson
He murdered my fiance. I just know it

She's been a ray of sunshine in my life. Sure she has something of sibling rivalry with Jameson, but what brother and sister don't? She's smart and witty and I was so looking forward to being a part of her family.
Oh that weasel? A scummy layabout who's done nothing for my fiance's business, but still demands 50% ownership. I don't know what Jameson saw in him.
She's fun when she's coherent at least. Good luck making any sense of her after the first bottle, the poor dear. She could use a cup of coffee, I'd wager.
Is it a crime for two women to have a conversation? I just happend to run into her on the way to the bathroom.
Is it really that obvious? We've been having an affair for months now. Alas, my marriage to Jameson would have made things incredibly complicated. Not that I would murder him over that!
